remarks.format: ## Remarks 這用來管理映像中的以程式設計的方式，提供方法來新增和移除映像物件。This is used to manage the images in the programmatically, providing methods to add and remove image objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何選取、 移除和顯示的影像，從屬性類別，這是型別。The following code example shows how to select, remove, and display images, from the property of the class, which is an type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換成之前加入至清單。The is converted to a before it is added to the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單中`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form that contains a button named `Button1`. 這個範例假設 c:\Windows FeatherTexture.bmp 和消失 Fishing.bmp 存在\\。The example assumes the existence of FeatherTexture.bmp and Gone Fishing.bmp at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統上，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system or exist at another location.
